tweet.text: In addition to her memoir, Madam Secretary, Albright published the book Read My Pins: Stories from a Diplomat’s Jewel Box, which highlighted her distinctive brooches that became part of her diplomatic style. https://t.co/YvesgwecJb https://t.co/d0oeD60cVZ
